citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE.
citations.narrative:
*** The wet sink/bath tub in the surgical prep area is rusted /corroded to the point where it can no longer be
adequately sanitized, and should be replaced.
This is for the health of the animals.
Correct by 12/1/2014
An exit interview was conducted with the facility manager on 5/30/2014.
